attributes.value: Has a negative view of those who exercise power over others

Values martial prowess

Sees war as a useful means to an end

Is quite polite

Is somewhat scatterbrained
Is a pessimist
Is very curious, sometimes to her detriment

Tries to keep her things orderly
Is trusting
Lives at a slow-going and leisurely pace

Strong
